doc:
My_Bloody_Valentine_3D http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/My_Bloody_Valentine_3D 0 My Bloody Valentine 3D is a 2009 American slasher film directed and co-edited by Patrick Lussier, and starring Jensen Ackles, Jaime King, Kerr Smith, and Kevin Tighe. It is a remake of the 1981 Canadian slasher film, and focuses on residents in a small mining town that is plagued by a serial killer on Valentine's Day. After filming on location in Pennsylvania, the film was given a 3D theatrical release in the United States on January 16, 2009 by Lionsgate. It was the first R-rated film to be projected in RealD technology and to have a wide release (1,000 locations) in 3D-enabled theaters. The film received mixed reviews from critics but was a box office success, grossing over $100 million worldwide. My Bloody Valentine 3D is a 2009 American slasher film directed and co-edited by Patrick Lussier, and starring Jensen Ackles, Jaime King, Kerr Smith, and Kevin Tighe. It is a remake of the 1981 Canadian slasher film, and focuses on residents in a small mining town that is plagued by a serial killer on Valentine's Day. After filming on location in Pennsylvania, the film was given a 3D theatrical release in the United States on January 16, 2009 by Lionsgate. It was the first R-rated film to be projected in RealD technology and to have a wide release (1,000 locations) in 3D-enabled theaters. The film received mixed reviews from critics but was a box office success, grossing over $100 million worldwide.
